Text: Uploading will be a bit "here and there" to begin with, but I will continue to upload this for as long as I have the files.

Thanks for the upload, Twiggy. I first heard Donovan's music when I was in the military overseas. A friend of mine (who was born in the UK) had an album, A Golden Hour of Donovan...something like that. I loved it and wish I could find a decent copy. 

Alack and alas...
